trans_examp.trans_cn: 重要的, 有重大影响的

example.eg: Listen to what I have to say.  It is important.
example.egtrans: 请好好听我说， 这很重要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重要的, 要紧的, 值得注意的

example.eg: He is a very important member of the cabinet.
He is an important person in the community.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有影响力的, 有权势的

example.eg: Phineas is just so important, isn't he?
example.egtrans: 菲尼斯真是太自命不凡了，是吧？

example.eg: He is a very important writer.
example.egtrans: 他是一位非常重要的作家。

example.eg: It is important to brush your teeth every day.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 极重要的, 至关紧要的

example.eg: When I asked why the street was blocked off the officer explained that some "important person" was due to arrive.
You are safe and well, that's the most important thing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最重要的事情, 要点

example.eg: The professor's self-important tone annoyed the students.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自高自大的，妄自尊大的
